label: C+P+T reversal = identical state
reason: CPT invariance is fundamental symmetry assumption
note: FOUNDATIONAL: C+P+T reversal = identical state. v22.0-12PAIR: CPT theorem holds in each (11,1) Lorentzian shadow. The 12x(2,0) Euclidean bridges are CPT-even (signature (2,0) has no time). Global CPT emerges from local shadow CPT x bridge parity. This is a framework assumption, not an empirical prediction.
